remarks: If ` S ` lies on PQ , then PQ = PS .  Theorem 6.16 of [Schwabhauser] p. 45.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-May-2019.)
statement:
tglineelsb2.p $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.

tglineelsb2.1 $e |- ( ph -> P e. B ) $.
tglineelsb2.2 $e |- ( ph -> Q e. B ) $.

tglineelsb2.6 $e |- ( ph -> S e. ( P L Q ) ) $.
tglineelsb2 $p |- ( ph -> ( P L Q ) = ( P L S ) ) $.
